titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar limitation on employer-provided group term life insurance that can be excluded from the gross income of the employee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/18/2013--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $50,000 to $375,000 the amount of employer-provided group term life insurance that an employee can exclude from gross income. Indexes the $375,000 amount for inflation for taxable years beginning after 2013.
